data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Hwanghae-bukto, North Korea to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hwanghae-bukto, North Korea
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Hwanghae-bukto, North Korea.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Hwanghae-bukto, North Korea.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, for the leaders in the state of Hwanghae-bukto, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Hwanghae-bukto, North Korea to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Deaf people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Hwanghae-bukto, North Korea.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Hwanghae-bukto that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.section_summary:
the state of Hwanghae-bukto, North Korea has a population of 2,113,700.

We estimate Hwanghae-bukto has 33,174 people who might know Jesus, 1,856 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,078,670 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 63 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Hwanghae-bukto. Through your servants plant 422 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.
